page.title: 14DAIRY FARMING
page.content: When we arrived we saw the farmer {milk}the{cows}.First she pulled the teats and squirted some milk,then she rubbed some antiseptic on them so that no germs could get into the milk.Then she gave the cows some cow cake and put the suckers onto the teats. When the small collecting tanks were full the milk was transferred to two larger tanks.The farmer went into her house and fetched a mug so that we could sample the milk if we wished to. The milk was warm and creamy. After being interviewed she showed us some cow cake which I tasted. It reminded me of my breakfast cereal. One boy in our class ran away when a cow mooed.It was funny.
